title: How Safy's Chemist Cut Near Misses by 97% and Freed 85% of Pharmacist Time
notes: Case study published on website December 15, 2025. Features 97% reduction in near misses (5-6/month to 2/year), 85% of pharmacist time freed for services, 14,500-15,000 items/month, 100% paperless workflow, zero lost prescriptions in a year.
